name: City Build Craft: Exploration
description:
🏗️Welcome to the City Build Craft – game of your city building dreams! Let’s construct & create awesome skyscrapers or design a small house – it’s up to you. You can also start city exploration and find funny minigames! Download City Build Craft for free! 🏗️

🏢 CITY EXPLORATION MOVED TO ANOTHER LEVEL 🏢
Build houses as you want! This lite pocket app, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based creative games for girls and boys, gives you an opportunity to transform and create the terrain in 3D environment. Build a perfect cube world and explore it any vehicle you choose. Ride a car or fly your own plane between skyscrapers! Go on an adventure in crafting & building style!

🏭 BEST BUILDCRAFT GAME 🏭
Construct skyscraper, build a bridge, dig a tunnel – it’s easy when you have blueprints! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube world to get diamonds. Become a city designer and an engineer who knows how to make your city a better place! Play this big city craft for girls or boys and have a lot of fun!

🏨 EXPLORATION IN THE PRETTY SCENERY 🏨
Explore beautiful cube worlds, build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of cube fortresses, skyscrapers and castles! Mine to the earth core if you want to find the most precious resources! Become an adventurer! No dragons and survival mode but still a lot of fun! Design your cube city world and use infinite creativity in the best exploring games of 2018!

🏦 PERFECTION IS WELL PAID🏦
Build perfect structures step by step, create awesome castles and buildings in very quick and easy way. All for free! Lite game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world generation, fast cars and enormous planes! Sell your best works, build a cube world and become a real city building tycoon!

🌇 FEEL THE FREEDOM 🌇
Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect buildings. This craft game for girls and boys contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world!

🏛️ MOST BEAUTIFUL CRAFT GAME 🏛️
High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, high FPS – quality without compromise! Place perfect blocks (cubes), move voxels, dig and mine to find a real treasures! Go beyond your wildest engineering dreams, make your own cube base, mine, castle or city! Start a cube craft you love! Don’t wait and play free games for girls and boys! So plunge into the fantastic world of City Build Craft – with new cube worlds and adventures!

CITY BUILD CRAFT FEATURES:
🏡 Awesome crafting & building experience!
🏡 Fly your own plane and explore the whole open world!
🏡 Craft items needed to complete your building vision!
🏡 Brand new textures and blueprints!

Play City Build Craft for free! Download now and finish the biggest craft project ever started!
developers: Tiny Dragon Adventure Games: Craft, Sport & RPG
